name: Snaphost_HKLM_windows
pattern: {"query": "select name,type,data from registry where key='HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows' and name='AppInit_DLLs';", "interval": 28800, "description": "**AppInit DLLs** Snapshot Returns the content of the key HKLM_Software_Microsoft_WindowsNT_CurrentVersion_Windows - ATT&CK T1103", "snapshot": true}
